Added_Other.name: FFlagAccountLockConsoleLogout
Added_Other.mechanism: Prevents users from logging into their account on consoles if the account is locked.
Added_Other.purpose: Enhances account security by ensuring locked accounts cannot be accessed on consoles.

Added_Other.name: FFlagEnableAccountLockModal
Added_Other.mechanism: Displays a modal to users when their account is locked.
Added_Other.purpose: Informs players about account lock status and guides them on how to unlock it.

Added_Other.name: FFlagEnableBiometricChallenges
Added_Other.mechanism: Enables the use of biometric data for authentication challenges.
Added_Other.purpose: Provides an additional layer of security for players when accessing their accounts.

Added_Other.name: FFlagEnableChallengeRateLimit
Added_Other.mechanism: Limits how often players can attempt certain challenges.
Added_Other.purpose: Prevents players from spamming challenges, making gameplay fairer.

Added_Other.name: FFlagEnableNativeChallengeAbandonment
Added_Other.mechanism: Introduces a system for players to abandon challenges natively within the game.
Added_Other.purpose: Gives players more control and flexibility, allowing them to exit challenges without penalties.

Added_Other.name: FFlagPersonaLivenessFocusNavigation
Added_Other.mechanism: Improves navigation focus on player avatars in social interactions.
Added_Other.purpose: Makes it easier for players to interact with and find their friends in the game.
